content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Plate Production at (1,1) and (3,1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces at positions (1,1) and (3,1)
- Burner inserters at positions (1.5,2.5) and (3.5,2.5)
- Wooden chests at positions (1.5,3.5) and (3.5,3.5) storing iron plates

###Empty Production Line at (5,1)
Consists of:
- Burner inserter at position (5.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at position (5.5,3.5)

###Copper Plate Production at (2,7) and (4,7)
Consists of:
- Stone furnaces at positions (2,7) and (4,7)
- Burner inserters at positions (2.5,8.5) and (4.5,8.5)
- Wooden chests at positions (2.5,9.5) and (4.5,9.5) storing copper plates

###Research Labs
Consists of:
- Two labs connected to power network at positions (6.5,16.5) and (12.5,17.5)

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (2.5,35.5) providing water
- Boiler at (7,35.5) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (13.5,35.5) generating electricity
- Pipe network connecting water and steam systems
- Extensive electrical network connecting multiple poles

###Unused Offshore Pump
- Standalone offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) with no connections

ERROR TIPS

### Technology Research Errors
- Check if a technology is already researched before attempting to research it again
- Use get_researched_technologies() to verify research status before setting new research

### Fluid System Warnings
- Ensure offshore pumps are properly connected to the fluid network
- The offshore pump at (-5.5,26.5) has no fluid connections - remove if not needed

### Production Line Status
- Multiple furnaces show "no ingredients to smelt" warning
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to keep production lines active
- Some inserters show "chest is full" warning - consider adding more storage or consumption of produced materials
